remarks.para:
-HTML Forms
-{{HTMLElement("input")}} and the interface it's based upon
-<input type="text">
-Compatibility of CSS properties

HTMLElementInputSearch.value: The value attribute contains a string representing the value contained in the search field. You can retrieve this using the HTMLInputElement.value property in JavaScript.If no validation constraints are in place for the input (see Validation for more details), the value can be any text string or an empty string ("").
